headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.3-b1ab53cfd0da7aadf28f89495f4d0b3e3c00670a "the [?local=true] query parameter to get-aliases requests has no effect and will be removed in a future version", 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.3-b1ab53cfd0da7aadf28f89495f4d0b3e3c00670a "this request accesses system indices: [.security-7, .tasks], but in a future major version, direct access to system indices will be prevented by default"
